title: 2017 Week 7 Preview: Can AP save the Cardinals & reaction to a wild TNF matchup
itunes:title: 2017 Week 7 Preview: Can AP save the Cardinals & reaction to a wild TNF matchup
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler & Gregg Rosenthal recap the wild ending of Thursday night's matchup between the Chiefs and Raiders (1:00); Plus a preview of all the Week 7 action, including a potential bounce back game for Cam Newton and the Panthers (19:00); Can Brett Hundley step up for the Packers in Aaron Rodgers' absence? (26:00); Do the Dolphins need a COMEBACK for a victory over the Jets (43:00); and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
